comment._content: Miguel Villanueva y Gómez (Madrid, Spain; 31 October 1852 - Madrid, 13 September 1931) was a Spanish politician and lawyer who served as Minister of State from 1915 to 1916, during the reign of King Alfonso XIII of Spain. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miguel_Villanueva_y_G%C3%B3mez
